title: 'Fresh Air' Remembers Screenwriter Paul Mazursky
teaser: Mazursky wrote such films as Next Stop, Greenwich Village; An Unmarried Woman; and Down and Out in Beverly Hills. He died last week at the age of 84. He talked with Terry Gross in 1991 and 1999.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
